name: atahualpa owl
notes:
**materials**
2 safety eyes 8 mm
stuffing
tapestry needle
stitch marker

friends cotton 8/6:
- dusty mauve (58) - 1 skein
- oatmilk (03) - 1 skein
- denim (80) - 1 skein
- eucalyptus (98) - 1 skein
- whisky (16) - 1 skein
- baby pink (51) - 1 skein

rainbow cotton 8/6:
- sunny yellow (055) - leftover
- dark brown (008) - 1 skein

baby cotton organic midi:
- eucalyptus (10) - 1 skein
